description: Chidori Kaname is a second-year student in Group Four at Jindai High School. Attentive and takes interest in others, loves to cook. Popular with others, she serves as class representative and student council vice-president. Kaname`s family lives in New York; her father is the United Nations` Environmental High Commissioner. Has a sister, Ayame, who is 11 years old. Her mother passed away three years ago. Kaname returned to Japan alone when she was in middle school, and has lived by herself in Tokyo ever since.
name: Chidori Kaname
